Termitron/Windlord/Nightlight::

Nightlight felt 2 of the four shots, she really didn't know what it 
was going on there. Windlord had tried to shot but something hit him 
and fell. He didn't hurted and looked and saw Termitron yelling 
furios aginst Gramps.

"Why are you hurting the queen?" screamming furios the bot "You has 
been protected by her... You're a betrayer... You won't belong the 
colony... YOU'RE A COLONY'S ENEMY!!!!! DUE THAT DIE COLONY'S 
ENEMY!!!!"

With a hit, Termitron trew Gramps far of Nightlight. Windlord moved 
close the door where Perplex had left. Windlord Screamed "Termitron, 
TRY TO CAPTURE HIM DON'T DESTROY HIM!!!"

In spite of the hawk wanted to kill Gramps due he shot Nightlight, he 
doubted that he could do it... Gramps was Perplex's family.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Windlord!  Cover Perplex!  Gramps!  You are a dead bot!"  He 
spins 
> around and runs at Gramps firing a merciless stream of shots firing 
25 shots 
> from each arm cannon at Gramps.
